other_participants_unable_see_and_hear_y: Other participants in the room will be unable to see and hear you.
other_participants_unable_to_see_you: Other participants in the room will be unable to see you.
other_participants_unable_to_hear_you: Other participants in the room will be unable to hear you.

permissions.cam_denied: The user has denied permission to use video. Please grant permission to the browser to access the camera.
permissions.mic_denied: The user has denied permission to use audio. Please grant permission to the browser to access the microphone.

suppress_background_noise: Suppress background noise from your microphone.
max_cam_on_msg: You cannot turn on your camera because this room has reached the maximum number of cameras allowed to be turned on.

max_cam_modal.title: Maximum number of cameras
max_cam_modal.content_1: This room has reached the maximum number of cameras allowed to be turned on.
max_cam_modal.content_2: Therefore, your camera function will be turned off.
max_cam_modal.content_3: It can be turned on again when the number of active cameras is below the maximum limit
